issue.title: [CF 1571] Tmw_options
issue.body:
Tellmewhen_options takes too much usage(12 mb), even after I disabled it from my addon list, any solution? 


> Posted by CurseForge user TheInvestigation | Imported from CurseForge issue #1571 | Raw

comments.body:
No. How much RAM do you actually have on your machine that 12MB is even remotely significant?

Edited Sep 2, 2018

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
